Segment.name: DVI
Segment.comment: To provide dynamic information pertaining to a vehicle

Field.name: UnitPrice
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier1
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod1
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier2
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod2
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: LicensePlateType
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of license

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: C0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If DVI01 is present, then DVI02 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either DVI04 or DVI05 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1011
SyntaxNote.comment: If either DVI10 or DVI11 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1409
